ArtisanBlock - Interface in com.artisan.powerhooks
Implement this interface to define an Artisan Power Hook Block.

Use PowerHookManager.registerBlock(String, String, Map, ArtisanBlock) to register this block with Artisan.

Then, once you connect to Artisan Tools for the first time you can dynamically modify the data that is used by this block from Artisan Tools.

This block will be invoked when you call PowerHookManager.executeBlock(String, Map, Context) in your app.
ArtisanBoundActivity - Interface in com.artisan.services
This is an interface for Activities which are bound to the Artisan Service.

ArtisanPushNotificationSettings() - Constructor for class com.artisan.push.ArtisanPushNotificationSettings
Create an empty Artisan Push Notification Settings.
ArtisanPushNotificationSettings(String) - Constructor for class com.artisan.push.ArtisanPushNotificationSettings
Provide Artisan with your Push Sender ID.
ArtisanPushNotificationSettings(String, ArtisanNotificationBuilder) - Constructor for class com.artisan.push.ArtisanPushNotificationSettings
Provide Artisan with your Push Sender ID and a notification builder to provide defaults for your app's notifications.

By setting a push sender Id you are implicitly enabling Artisan Push Messaging.

Important: If you do not provide a small icon for your notifications via the builder we will default to using your app icon.
ArtisanRegisteredApplication - Interface in com.artisan.application
 
ArtisanSocialSharingManager - Class in com.artisan.incodeapi
Manages tracking social sharing events with Artisan.

This includes recording Artisan analytics events for each share to a social network along with any additional information that you would like to track.

These analytics events are automatically synced with Artisan and can be used for Advanced segmentation and personalization with the Artisan analytics reports, experiments, power hooks and campaigns.
ArtisanSocialSharingManager() - Constructor for class com.artisan.incodeapi.ArtisanSocialSharingManager

Manages in-code analytics tracking designed for use with Artisan.

clearProfile() - Static method in class com.artisan.incodeapi.ArtisanProfileManager
Clear out all previously specified profile information.

Use this method to clear out all data previously specified for the current user, including any data set via setSharedUserId, setUserAge, setGender, and setStringVale, etc.

This can be called from anywhere in your app.

D

disableArtisanPush() - Static method in class com.artisan.manager.ArtisanManager
Disable Artisan Push for this app.
disableAutoEventCollection() - Static method in class com.artisan.manager.ArtisanManager
This method will prevent Artisan from automatically collecting analytics events for user interactions like button taps on static and dynamic views alike.

This will not prevent auto-collection of screen view and collecting app start/close events.

Call this method before startArtisan in the onCreate of your Application class.
disableGesture() - Static method in class com.artisan.manager.ArtisanManager
This method will prevent the Artisan Gesture Overlay from being added to your Activities, which will prevent you from making the Artisan Gesture.

Call this method before startArtisan in the onCreate of your Application class.

This is a workaround for app developers for whom the Artisan Gesture Listener conflicts with existing touch and gesture handling.

IMPORTANT: This is safe to use in production, but know that you will not be able to connect with Artisan Tools from a build of your app that has this flag turned on.
disableGestureAndShowLoginOnForeground() - Static method in class com.artisan.manager.ArtisanManager
If you are on the connect your device screen in ArtisanTools in your browser, then this will pop up the Artisan login modal on your app when you foreground.

Call this method before startArtisan in the onCreate of your Application class.

This is a workaround for app developers for whom the Artisan Gesture Listener conflicts with existing touch and gesture handling.

IMPORTANT: Don't include this in your production code!! Otherwise your app users could see the login box on foreground if you have the Artisan connect your device screen up on your browser.

isFirstPlaylistDownloaded() - Static method in class com.artisan.manager.ArtisanManager
Check if the first Artisan Playlist is downloaded from the servers since the app process is started.

If this is true when you register your callback with ArtisanManager.onFirstPlaylistDownloaded(Activity, ArtisanManagerCallback) then your callback will execute immediately.

O

onFirstPlaylistDownloaded(Activity, ArtisanManagerCallback) - Static method in class com.artisan.manager.ArtisanManager
Register a callback to be called when the first Artisan Playlist is downloaded from the servers after the app process is started.

This method has no timeout, so it will wait indefinitely.
onFirstPlaylistDownloaded(Activity, ArtisanManagerCallback, long) - Static method in class com.artisan.manager.ArtisanManager
Register a callback to be called when the first Artisan Playlist is downloaded from the servers after the app process is started.

If the timeout is reached before the first playlist is downloaded then the block will be executed.

NOTE: The thread calling the block of code is guaranteed to be the main thread.
onPowerHookChanged(Activity, PowerHookCallback) - Method in class com.artisan.powerhooks.PowerHookVariable
Register a callback which will be executed on the UI thread when this Power Hook value changes.
onPowerHooksChanged(Activity, PowerHookCallback) - Static method in class com.artisan.powerhooks.PowerHookManager
Register a callback for when a Power Hook value changes.

The values can change anytime a new playlist is downloaded from the Artisan servers.

You might want to use this as an opportunity to get the latest values and update elements on the screen.

NOTE: The thread calling the block of code is guaranteed to be the main thread.

P

playlistChanged(ArtisanPlaylistUpdatedEvent) - Method in class com.artisan.manager.ArtisanManager
For internal use only.
PowerHookBlock - Class in com.artisan.powerhooks
Represents an Artisan Power Hook Block.

A PowerHookBlock has an ArtisanBlock you would like to use in your app with data that is configurable from Artisan Tools.

You don't need to instantiate this class yourself, but will see instances of this if you call PowerHookManager.getAllBlocks().
PowerHookBlock() - Constructor for class com.artisan.powerhooks.PowerHookBlock
 
PowerHookBlock(String, Map<String, String>, ArtisanBlock) - Constructor for class com.artisan.powerhooks.PowerHookBlock
 
PowerHookExperimentDetails - Class in com.artisan.powerhooks
Contains information about a Power Hook experiment.

This does not include the current experimental value for the Power Hook variable or block.
PowerHookManager - Class in com.artisan.powerhooks
Manages all Power Hooks used with Artisan.
powerHookValueUpdatedFromPlaylist(PowerHookVariableUpdatedEvent) - Method in class com.artisan.powerhooks.PowerHookVariable
This is an internal method.
PowerHookVariable - Class in com.artisan.powerhooks
Represents an Artisan Power Hook Variable.

A PowerHookVariable is a variable you would like to use in your app whose value is configurable from Artisan Tools.

You don't need to instantiate this class yourself, but will see instances of this if you call PowerHookManager.getAllVariables() or PowerHookManager.getPowerHookVariable(String)

Once registered, the value for this variable can be set using setDateTimeValue:forVariable:.

removeItemFromCart(String, Number, String, int) - Static method in class com.artisan.incodeapi.ArtisanPurchaseWorkflowManager
Call this method to remove an item from the Artisan cart model for the current purchase workflow.

It will remove the first item in the cart that matches the productIdentifier, price, description and quantity.

_getArtisanService() - Static method in class com.artisan.activity.ArtisanActivity
